title: Pear and raspberry sherry trifle
ingredients: ['1 (300g) plain sponge or Madeira cake', '1 (400g) tin pear halves, diced and juice reserved', '300g frozen raspberries, thawed', '6 tablespoons sherry, or to taste', '1kg carton prepared custard', '1 (284ml) carton of whipping cream, whipped', '50g flaked almonds, lightly toasted and cooled (optional)']
